pages.text: $(bgreen)Torch Wood$() is respected by others for his integrity, for his steadfast friendship, for his ability to greatly maximize pea damage. But He has a secret: He can't read.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)175$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)assist$() plant, which will heat nearby peas and mutiple their damage. $(m)Except snow peas$().

$(bpurple)Special :$() It can give players in 10 blocks $(l)Light Eye effect$() to $(bred)dispel the fog$().$(br)$(bpurple)Plant Food :$() It can turn yellow flame to$(l)blue flame$() and increase more damage for peas.
